title: gollatErella kUDi
sahitya:
gollatEralla kUDi enna mEle illada suddi puTTisi 
kaLLanendu dUrutAre ammayyA nI kELabEkindA bageye


caraNam 1    haraviya hAlu kuDiyalu enna hoTTe kereyAne kELe ammayya 
karedu aNNana kELu unTAdare oraLige kaTTu innomme
    caraNam 2    mIsalu beNNeya meddare adu dOSavallave enage ammayya 
Ase mADidare dEvaru enna mOsa mADi kaNNu muccane
    caraNam 3    ungura karadinda gOpi tanna shrngArada maganennetti 
mangaLa mUruti purandara viTTalana hingade muddADi pADutaliddaLu
